summary: Texture replacer for Barenziahs chestbox + jewel textures/normal maps
descriptionHtml:
The chestbox was made with the concept of accompanying [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5114]Barenziahs Crappy Jewel[/url] but i thought I might as well have another go at that as well...

Both jewel and chestbox come with their own normal maps... The jewels normal map will be further updated at some point with smaller surfaces.

Version Notes:
2.0 Changed gold textures/normal maps ---  SOME MIGHT STILL PREFER THE OLD BUMP MAPS
1.0 initial release

*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete barenziahsjewelrybox, barenziahsjewelrybox_n, barenziahscrown, barenziahscrown_g and barenziahscrown_n.dds from Data\\textures\\clutter\\quest

*****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************
